details.rules: While this card is in your hand, your melee attacks knock characters back 3 squares. Cast    to knock a visible character back 3 squares.
details.flavour: This one'll bring down the house.

details.rules: While this card is in your hand, characters you damage are healed for the same amount        instead. Cast to deal damage equal to the amount you healed this turn.
details.flavour: "Clear!" - Dr. Asterope, before killing 10 with a defibrillator.
